author: sky.cactus
content: That reduces down to "lets make it easier for people to scam users in the name of making it harder for people to find the scams".  I don't agree with this tactic, though I understand the line of argumentation.

author: sky.cactus
content: In reality, I think if ethereum.org loses SEO over ETH2 then you'll just end up with coindesk and coinbase at the top of the list.  Hopefully we can get Coinbase to stop using the term, so that puts coindesk next.  I think it would be quite difficult for a scammer to overtake coindesk.

author: djrtwo
content: yeah, I see that. I just note that the transition *will* occur and that those who manage the site want to handle it with care
